casebody.data:
Frank J. Riccio v. Department of Labor, Employment Security Appeals Division, Board of Review (13480)

O’Connell, Foti and Hennessy, Js.

Submitted on briefs February 17 decision released March 21, 1995 *911Francis J. Ficarra filed a brief for the appellant (plaintiff). Richard Blumenthal, attorney general, and Sharon A. Scully and Charles A. Overend, assistant attorneys general, filed a brief for the appellee (defendant). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
